outputs.output_descr: The project endeavours to contribute to achieving a political scenario that is the most favourable to democratic governance in El Salvador in the medium term (2010), characterized by managing the effects of the global economic crisis and the outcome of the 2009 general elections.  It is aimed at strengthening democratic institutions in order to promote the development of viable strategies, programmes and projects, in the most favourable scenario possible for democratic governance in the country, based on the promotion of informed dialogue, on a foundation of technically sound proposals that enable key political actors to identify the primary challenges to governance and thus be able to manage them.
